Can someone point me to an example website that I can take a look at to get a feel for how templates and modules work together? My site was built by the migration team and I'm finding it hard to untangle. Looking for best practices. I've looked through docs, but I need a more "real world" example if possible.
Hey <@UFAUZE1QD> HubSpot has a Inspire Gallery here: <https://designers.HubSpot.com/inspire> that may help ya with what you are looking for

Thanks <@U2H3TT8F2>! Do you know if there is documentation that takes a deep dive into the HubSpot grid system? Questions that I have at the moment are; "What is the purpose of row-depth-1?" and "What is the purpose of counting rows as in row-number-1, row-number-2, etc.?"

For a general explanation fo the grid:
<https://designers.HubSpot.com/docs/cos/the-cos-responsive-grid>

As far as why the purpose, I dont know that off hand.
